original_text: For every person who eats of the fat of an animal of which a food offering may be made to the Lord shall be cut off from his people.
korean_text: 사람이 여호와께 화제로 드리는 제물의 기름을 먹으면 그 먹는 자는 자기 백성 중에서 끊어지리라

sentences.original_text: who eats of the fat of an animal
of which a food offering may be made to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그것으로 주께 음식 제물을 드릴 수 있는

sentences.original_text: shall be cut off from his people.
